statements: DELETE FROM toll_collection WHERE collection_date < '2022-01-01' AND toll_amount > 50.00;
DELETE FROM toll_collection WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND collection_date = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM toll_collection WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND collection_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM revenue_generation WHERE total_revenue > 10000 AND generation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE owner_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2015;
